software.name: wagn
software.description:
Wagn combines the editing and linking capabilities of a wiki with the ability to create more complex relationships, like a database
Wagneering is the process of creating, configuring, structuring, and evolving Wagn websites.
software.custom_install_script:
mkdir  /home/local/wagn
/usr/local/rbenv/shims/gem install -i /home/local/wagn  wagn
 /home/local/wagn/bin/wagn new /home/app
cd /home/app
cp database.yml config/
 /home/local/wagn/bin/wagn seed

template_files.title: database.yml
template_files.content:
production:
  adapter: mysql2
  encoding: utf8
  reconnect: false
  database: _Engines(dname)
  pool: 5
  username: _Engines(dbuser)
  password: _Engines(dbpasswd)
  host:  _Engines(dbhost)
